subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Affix
Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|count=台|くるま}}

# a [[car]], an [[automobile]], a [[carriage]], a [[cart]]
# a [[wheel]], a [[caster]]
# something [[wheel]]-[[shaped]]
# a style of {{m|ja|紋|tr=mon||family [[crest]]}}
# short for various terms:
## {{short for|nocap=1|nodot=1|lang=ja|sort=くるま|車海老}} (''kuruma ebi''): a [[prawn]]
## {{short for|nocap=1|nodot=1|lang=ja|sort=くるま|車懸}} (''kuruma-gakari''): “wheel formation”, a battle tactic where units attack in staged waves in order to prevent the opponent from resting
## {{short for|nocap=1|nodot=1|lang=ja|sort=くるま|肩車}} (''kata-guruma''): riding on one's shoulders, [[piggyback]]
## {{short for|nocap=1|nodot=1|lang=ja|sort=くるま|手車}} (''te-guruma''): a [[handcart]], a [[wheelbarrow]]
## {{short for|nocap=1|nodot=1|lang=ja|sort=くるま|車座}} (''kuruma za''): [[sitting]] in a [[circle]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=くるま|obsolete}} during the {{w|Edo period}}, in the [[red-light district]] in {{w|Ōsaka}}, a [[prostitute]] whose services cost four {{m|ja|匁|tr=monme}} and three {{m|ja|分|tr=bun}} (possibly in reference to the cost of a carriage ride)
